pages.text: The Sigil of Remedium provides continuous protection against harmful magical effects. When activated, this sigil monitors the bearer's condition and automatically cleanses any negative status effects as they appear.
Right-click to toggle the sigil on or off. When active, it will remove all negative effects once per second.$(br2)LP Cost: 50 LP per effect removed

pages.title: Usage Notes
pages.text: The sigil must be in your inventory to function. It will automatically deactivate if you run out of LP.$(br2)Unlike drinking milk, the Remedium sigil is selective - it only removes harmful effects while preserving beneficial ones such as regeneration, strength, and other positive buffs.
